category.name: SocialCollaboration.AWC
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: S2clCommentary.TrendingPeriod
preference.preference_description: Defines the number of days (trending period) for which Trending data needs to be retrieved in the Social Collaboration application of the Active Workspace client. The "Fetch Trending Data" service uses the system date minus the trending period to retrieve socially active objects.
